imdb.plot outline: After DWFA 2014 decides to do 3AM challenges, Things take a turn for the worse when The Devil calls him. After the call DWFA 2014 consumes the darkness of the devil. As he gets thrown into hell and the devil unleashes into the world to take full control. Nothing can stop THE DEVIL.
imdb.title: The Devil's Hour Series
plot: After DWFA 2014 decides to do 3AM challenges, Things take a turn for the worse when The Devil calls him. After the call DWFA 2014 consumes the darkness of the devil. As he gets thrown into hell and the devil unleashes into the world to take full control. Nothing can stop THE DEVIL.::Riley Cole
